channel.title: Any Differences Between Opposing Force Retail Version and Steam?
channel.description: I was curious since I have access to the retail version. I realize the retail disc requires the original Half-Life to play but were there any differences between the two, even in minor details - for example, "Gina's" corpse in Xen or the music?

item.title: Any Differences Between Opposing Force Retail Version and Steam?
item.dc:creator: Pandorium
item.description:
Serza:

I heard about some soundtrack issues (Steam version using original HL soundtrack instead of it’s own), but that is fixed now, AFAIK.

Yeah I came across someone mentioning that in the Steam forums when I tried to Googlefu before posting this.

Read full topic
item.source: Any Differences Between Opposing Force Retail Version and Steam?

I was curious since I have access to the retail version. I realize the retail disc requires the original Half-Life to play but were there any differences between the two, even in minor details - for example, “Gina’s” corpse in Xen or the music?
